 1. Introduction
 Welcome to CondiPlant! CondiPlant is a mobile application designed to help farmers and agricultural workers to identify root crop diseases using machine learning and image recognition technology. By using this app, you agree to these Terms and Conditions.

 Developer Information: CondiPlant

4. Permissions Required

 CondiPlant requires access to:
 - Camera: For capturing images of crops for disease identification.
 By granting these permissions, you allow CondiPlant to perform its core functionalities. If you deny these permissions, certain features may not work as intended.

5. Accuracy and Limitation of Disease Identification

 CondiPlant uses machine learning to analyze and identify potential root crop diseases based on image recognition. However, the identification provided by CondiPlant is advisory and may not always be accurate. We strongly recommend consulting with an agricultural expert for confirmation and further guidance.


6. Privacy Policy

 Your privacy is important to us. CondiPlant is designed to operate offline, ensuring that your personal data remains secure. We do not collect or store any user information, including images captured by the app. All images are stored temporarily during the analysis process and are deleted immediately after use. This ensures your data remains private and is not retained on our servers or devices.
